page.title: 05ST. PAUL'S WARD - OLDHAM
page.content: We have been studying the locality in which we live. It is a {built _up} area,with only small pockets of recently landscaped areas.The buildings are a mixture of old and new,ranging from Hathershaw Hall to our own new school.This locality is dominated by Ashton Road,linking Oldham with Ashton. It is a bus route, with shops serving the local area. The three major employers in the ward are the Littlewoods mail order company, Thorn EMI.and Park Cake Bakery. The housing in the ward is mainly terraced,with a few newer houses.Most of it was built before the second world war,and there is a scheme to rennovate this housing
